existing_features.title: Generate a static XML sitemap file at `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` that lists all public pages of the SafarX site including: Home (/), Destinations (/destinations), each individual destination detail page (/destinations/:id for all destinations in destinations.ts), Packages (/packages), Plan Trip (/plan-trip), Contact (/contact), and Community (/community). Each URL entry should include a <loc> with the canonical domain (safarx.in), a <lastmod> date, a <changefreq> value appropriate to the page type, and a <priority> value reflecting page importance (e.g., Home = 1.0, main sections = 0.8, detail pages = 0.6).

Add a sitemap reference to `frontend/index.html` by inserting a `<link rel="sitemap" type="application/xml" title="Sitemap" href="/sitemap.xml" />` tag in the document <head>, and also add a robots.txt file at `frontend/public/robots.txt` that allows all crawlers and points to the sitemap URL (https://safarx.in/sitemap.xml).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add sitemap to help search engines discover and index all pages
